mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cars (car_name, car_number, car_distance, car_year, car_image, car_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) VALUES (#{carName}, #{carNumber}, #{carDistance}, #{carYear}, #{carImage}, #{carExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT car_seq, car_name, car_number, car_distance, car_year, car_explain, car_image FROM tb_cars WHERE car_seq = #{carSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_cars SET car_name = #{carName}, car_number = #{carNumber}, car_distance = #{carDistance}, car_year = #{carYear}, car_explain = #{carExplain}, car_image = #{carImage} WHERE car_seq = #{carSeq};
